item.title: Datelife
item.description:
Talk about:

  • The premises of datelife, why is it important.
  • The history of the datelife project. Link to Brian presentation in evolution 2010 available from youtube, mention first developers.
  • Link to my poster from evolution, or do a presentation about it.
  • Link to the biorxiv preprint
  • Talk about preliminary results from datelife_paper2

Add Brian as a coauthor

item.title: iNaturalist phylogenies
item.description:
Talk about:

  • In what context was this developed.
  • Link to Phylotasticed
  • improvements, future stuff

Add Lauren Chan profile

item.title: Phylotastic
item.description:
Talk about:

  • The premises of phylotastic, why I think it is important.
  • My participation in the project, rphylotastic
  • Link to the biorxiv preprint and other papers

Add all other authors?
